synopsis.text:
Double Circle, an original online anime series presented by Toshiba, unfolds in the vibrant and technologically advanced 'Smart City' of Kawasaki, Japan. This smart community, symbolized by the 'Double Circle,' represents an infinite evolution powered by energy and Information and Communication Technology (ICT).

In this dynamic city, ordinary citizens find themselves transforming into heroes, each embodying various forms of renewable energy. Their mission? To protect their evolving city from sinister forces that threaten to steal from their thriving world and drag it into a timeless, colorless void.

The narrative weaves together themes of energy, environmental sustainability, and economic growth, all powered by ICT. As the heroes of Kawasaki rise to the challenge, they embody the spirit of a community striving for a smarter, greener future.

Join the heroes of Kawasaki as they harness the power of renewable energy and technology to defend their city and triumph over the forces of stagnation in this exciting and innovative anime series. (Source: Derived from official synopses)
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
